nodes.text: Ord Canfre was a planet in the Outer Rim Territories. It was once an Ordnance/Regional Depot.

Ord Canfre was a planet colonized by the Galactic Republic as a Ordnance/Regional Depot some time circa 12,000 BBY. Like most ORDs during the Old Republic era, it was the location of an Exploration Corps outpost. In the decade following the Ruusan Reformation, Jedi Master Bowspritz visited the outpost and encountered Akk dogs used as companions by
Jedi.

During the Clone Wars, Ord Canfre was the site of a battle that turned into a debacle for the Republic. The Ailon Nova Guard that fought on the Republic side was critical of the Jedi leadership, feeling they were too lenient. The planet eventualy surrendered to the Confederacy of Independent Systems in 22 BBY.
The world was conquered by the Yuuzhan Vong during their invasion of the galaxy.
